entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
